SRP.Q: On Ironwood Ranch, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1982 relative to that in 1984 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Ironwood Ranch, the data point in 1982 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1984.
